categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire
Category:Starships of the Imperial splinter factions

nodes.text: Wolf's Claw was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer. It was one of the three Imperial-class Star Destroyers assigned as support for Admiral Gaen Drommel's flagship, Guardian. The Wolf's Claw participated in the Battle of Tantive V in 4 ABY, where it was captured by New Republic forces and later incorporated into the New Republic Defense Fleet.
